snippet.title: Forever Skies Extended Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
It's here, the Extended Gameplay Trailer for Forever Skies.

Support the developers by wishlisting here - http://steam.pm/app/1641960 

Update: Forever Skies is a post-apocalyptic survival game coming to Steam Early Access in 2023. Four-player co-op to be included after release.

Back when we revealed the game and teaser trailer in January, you saw clips of our protagonist, the lone scientist on a mission to discover the location of a specific virus sample. The Full Gameplay Trailer shows that mission in much greater detail. 

Please watch, like, comment, share and enjoy

Join our community: https://discord.gg/mf9kRzAW8A  

In Forever Skies you are a scientist returning to Earth destroyed by a global ecological disaster. You will fly a high-tech airship, expand, rebuild and repair it. Look for and scavenge resources to survive, face the dangers of the surface. Search for viral pathogens to cure a mysterious illness. The game will be coming to Early Access in 2022 and later to next-gen consoles.

Twitter - https://twitter.com/flyforeverskies 
Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/FlyForeverSkies

Visit our website to learn more about our studio: https://www.farfromhomegames.com/en

#flyforeverskies #survival #postapo #scifi #pcgame #consolegame #videogame.
